function.name: get_a_product_details_for_amazon_scrapper_v4
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "amazon_scrapper_v4", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "get_a_product_details_for_amazon_scrapper_v4.
You can get the product id from the URL when you search for a particular product. It is the next value after '/dp/'.
Eg: B08N5WG761 is the value we want from the url - 
https://www.amazon.in/Apple-MacBook-Chip-"

answer_generation.query: I'm a tech enthusiast and I'm looking for the latest gadgets. Can you provide me with details of a specific product with the ID B08N5WG761 on Amazon? Also, fetch the search results for the query 'sdfsdf' on Amazon and recommend some cutting-edge products. Additionally, please suggest some popular products from the Gymshark store that might be of interest to tech-savvy individuals.
